name: ACM-ICPC
description: The olympics of programming community. It is the oldest, largest, and most prestigious programming contest in the world.
eligibility: A student must be enrolled in a degree program at the team’s institution with at least a half-time load.

name: Google Kickstart
description: Kick Start is a global online coding competition, consisting of three-hour rounds of a variety of algorithmic challenges designed by Google engineers.

name: Google Code Jam
description: Code Jam is Google's longest running global coding competition. Competitors work their way through a series of online algorithmic puzzles to earn a spot at the World Finals, all for a chance to win the championship title and 15,000 USD.

name: Google Hashcode
description: Hash Code is a team programming competition, organized by Google, for students and professionals around the world. Pick your team and programming language and solve some interesting engineering problems.Top teams will then be invited to a Google office for the Final Round.

name: Facebok Hacker Cup
description: Hacker Cup is Facebook's annual open programming competition. Open to participants around the world, we invite you to apply problem-solving and algorithmic coding skills to advance through each year’s online rounds, win prizes, and have a chance to make it to the global finals and win the grand prize.
